MESSAGES.UNRECOVERABLE_EXCEPTION: An error occured and the application can't function correctly without a refresh.
MESSAGES.INVOCATION_EXCEPTION: There is an error on the server or the server can't function correctly.
MESSAGES.UNAUTHENTICATED: Your session has epired. You should authenticate again.
MESSAGES.INSUFFICIENT_RIGHTS: You don't have enough rights for this action.
MESSAGES.USER_WITH_NAME_EXISTS: User with this username already exists.
MESSAGES.ERR_SAVE_USER: An error occured while saving the user.
MESSAGES.REQUIRED_FIELDS_NOT_COMPLETED_OR_WRONG: Some fields are not filled or are incorrect.
MESSAGES.DATE_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL: Date must be less than or equal to [{{value}}].
MESSAGES.DATE_MUST_BE_MORE_THAN_OR_EQUAL: Date must be bigger than or equal to [{{value}}].

MESSAGES.CONFIRM_DELETE_USER: Are you sure you want to delet the selected user?
MESSAGES.VALIDATOR_DUPLICATED_FIELD: The value of this field already exists.

MESSAGES.USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: User witch such username already exists!

MESSAGES.PARAMETER_VALUE_IS_NOT_OF_TYPE_NUMBER: Parameter is not of type number!
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION_DOESNT_MATCH: Password confirmation doesn't match. Try again.
